title: Adventure Souls Trap Music pack (loop)
description: A captivating collection of high-energy soundtracks that fuse the intensity of trap music with the thrill of adventure.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

A gripping game soundtrack that combines the best of trap music with the excitement of epic adventures.

By Purchasing the package you have the rights to use any commercial project to use in (games, software, videos, animation, etc)
You have the rights to the modified track (pitch down, pitch up, sampling)


1) Crystle Water

2) Dark End

3) Into the Deep

4) Lost Void

5) Running Ruins

6) Sky Crown

7) Sleepy Night

8) Trap Adventure

9) Trap Fusion

10) Upside Walk

(also has 10 additional soundtrack versions of these tracks)

note :- All the music tracks I have composed are created from scratch. My artist name is Meraj Melody. You can visit my YouTube channel to see how I create music from scratch. If you need verification of my music, I can also provide video screenshots of my projects demonstrating how I composed these tracks. As a musician dedicated to producing original music, I ensure that I do not use any third-party samples or AI tools in my compositions. This is to preserve the originality of my work and avoid potential legal issues in the future.


Update 27- 1 - 2024

After Many requests from customers/developers who are using this package.

I decided to remove the YouTube content ID from this package.


This means you will not get a copyright claim for using this music on YouTube.

 If you do receive a false claim, please contact me immediately.
